text:
In performance testing we are using the GSS and CSS/CSM switches. As JMeter is 
the client I need the TTL (Time To Live) parameter to set so that CSM switch 
round-robins the request to the 6 servers,else request will go to the same 
server.

Let me know how to set TTL parameter, I don't see any.
creator: vincent.arokiaraj@bt.com
sebb@apache.org
text: Never heard of TTL in conjunction with HTTP - assuming that you are using HTTP?

creator: vincent.arokiaraj@bt.com
text:
Pls see the following for TTL in HTTP context

http://www.cisco.com/univercd/cc/td/doc/product/webscale/uce/acns50/cnfg50/para
ms.pdf

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
That is nothing to do with the HTTP client (i.e. JMeter) - it describes 
parameters for some kind of caching application.

This seems to be JMeter usage query - please ask on the JMeter user mailing 
list.
